thing-type.label: Network Device
thing-type.description: Device which must be connected to the same network

parameter.name: hostname
parameter.label: Hostname or IP
parameter.description: Hostname or IP of the device

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: The port on which the device can be accessed

parameter.name: retry
parameter.label: Retry
parameter.description: Defines how many times a ping shall occur, before the device is stated as offline

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.label: Timeout
parameter.description: States how long to wait (in ms), if a connection can not be established. If system ping is used, only full seconds are valid.

parameter.name: refresh_interval
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: States how often a refresh shall occur (in ms)

parameter.name: use_system_ping
parameter.label: Use System Ping
parameter.description: Uses the ping program from the system

parameter.name: dhcplisten
parameter.label: Listen for DHCP requests
parameter.description: Whether to use DHCP listen or not (may require running as root)

channel-type.label: Online
channel-type.description: States whether a device is online or not
